thought: To craft a pink bed I need to craft pink dye. Pink dye requires 1 red dye and 1 white dye. Therefore I will first move the beetroot (which can be used to craft red dye) into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1
